elements.text: You are planning to start a load of laundry. As you pick up your laundry basket to carry it to the washing machine, you feel wobbly. You don't think you will be able do your laundry right now, and you feel...

elements.name: Laundry Dilemma_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
